pipeline {
    agent any

    stages {
        stage('Checkout') {
            steps {
                checkout scm
            }
        }

        stage('Build & Test') {
            steps {
                echo 'Running Maven clean test...'
                // Run Maven; adjust mvn command if needed
                bat 'mvn clean test'
            }
        }

        stage('Publish Test Report') {
            steps {
                // Publish JUnit XML reports generated by Maven Surefire
                junit '**/target/surefire-reports/*.xml'
            }
        }
    }

    post {
        always {
            // Archive test reports and other artifacts if needed
            archiveArtifacts artifacts: '**/target/*.jar', allowEmptyArchive: true
        }
        failure {
            echo 'Build failed!'
        }
    }
}
